decks.notes: The main concept of this Aggro - Death's Shadow deck is to quickly reduce your own life total in order to power up Death's Shadow and capitalize on the powerful effects of cards like Grief and Not Dead After All. The deck focuses on disruptive elements like Dauthi Voidwalker, Thoughtseize, and Fatal Push to disrupt your opponent's strategy while maintaining a fast and aggressive pace. The deck also includes various removal spells like Dismember, Victim of Night, and Brazen Borrower for additional control. Overall, the key concept is to utilize the synergies between life manipulation, disruption, and aggressive creatures to overwhelm your opponent.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize the "Hardened Scales" enchantment to generate additional +1/+1 counters on creatures. The deck focuses on assembling a combination of creatures and artifacts that can benefit from these counters, such as Arcbound Ravager, Hangarback Walker, and Walking Ballista. It also includes support cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp to further enhance the counters strategy. The deck aims to aggressively build up counters and overwhelm opponents with large, resilient creatures while maintaining board presence with cards like Welding Jar and Urza's Saga.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on playing low-cost aggressive creatures like Ragavan and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to control the board. Counterspell provides protection against opponent's threats, while card selection cards like Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble help maintain card advantage. Murktide Regent serves as a powerful finisher in the late game. The deck aims to quickly pressure the opponent and disrupt their game plan with a mix of creatures, removal, and disruption spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and relentless assault using Merfolk creatures. The deck focuses on maximizing the Lords of Atlantis effect to boost the power of all Merfolk. It also utilizes Aether Vial and Mutavault to quickly deploy and maintain a strong battlefield presence. The deck incorporates disruptive elements like Merfolk Trickster and Subtlety to hinder the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Force of Negation provides additional protection and control. Overall, the deck aims to establish early and consistent aggression to outpace and overpower the opponent.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, along with removal like Fatal Push and Damnation. The deck also utilizes ramp with Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth to accelerate into powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and Karn, the Great Creator. March of Wretched Sorrow provides additional value by recurring creatures from the graveyard. The deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent to secure victory.

The core principle of this deck revolves around utilizing aggressive tactics and the Death's Shadow card to quickly and efficiently defeat opponents. The deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's strategy through cards like Drown in the Loch, Thoughtseize, and Spell Pierce. It also utilizes efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Orcish Bowmasters to deal damage and apply pressure. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an additional layer of consistency and resource generation to the deck.

This deck revolves around the concept of quickly generating mana and accelerating into powerful creatures. The key idea is to use Amulet of Vigor to untap lands when entering the battlefield, allowing for explosive mana generation. Primeval Titan is the main win condition, as it can fetch Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Vesuva to create a devastating combo. The deck also utilizes lands that provide additional utility or synergies, such as Gruul Turf and Simic Growth Chamber. Overall, the deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with its powerful creatures and land interactions.
